mapper.select:
select FORMAT(COALESCE((AVG(s_service_level)*20),0),0) as mark from order_send_info WHERE 1=1
and m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from order_send_info where s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND MONTH(oc_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND WEEK(oc_time,1) = WEEK(CURDATE())

select count(*) from order_send_info where s_id = #{0} and month(oc_time) = month(#{1}) and year(oc_time) = year(#{1})
and s_service_level = 5
and s_service_level >=3 and s_service_level <=4
and s_service_level >=1 and s_service_level <=2

mapper.select: select a.* from order_send_info a LEFT JOIN order_shop b ON a.order_shop_id = b.id where b.shop_id=#{shopId} and b.status=7
